title: Remove 'WhatsApp' text label from floating WhatsApp button

requirements.text: In the FloatingWhatsAppButton component, remove the text label 'WhatsApp' from the button so that only the WhatsApp icon is displayed. The element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/a[1]/span[1] (the text span inside the floating WhatsApp anchor/button) should be removed or hidden, leaving only the icon visible.

quotes: Yaha pe bss whatsapp button rahe naa ki likha ho whatsapp

acceptanceCriteria: The floating WhatsApp button displays only the WhatsApp icon with no text label.
The text 'WhatsApp' is not visible anywhere on the floating button.
The button remains fully functional and still links to the WhatsApp chat URL.
The button layout/positioning is not broken after removing the text.

constraints: Do not change the button's functionality, link, or positioning.
nonGoals: Changing the WhatsApp button's icon, color, or size.
Modifying any other WhatsApp-related buttons or links on other pages.
